title: free rotation champs
body: How come my free to play champions dosnt match the one's on this site? Whereever i go into google and type  ```free rotation´´  it dosnt show the ones i ever have, mine hasnt updated yet either and they arent the same as the ones the last week or this week, how come?

replies.body: Players under a certain level (I think 10) will have a limited "new player" pool of free champions. Once you hit that certain level, you'll get the regular free champion rotation.

This ^

For levels 1-10 you have a different free champion list of champs who are relatively beginner friendly. Once you hit level 11 it'll transition into the normal rotation ^_^
